name: sport-ball
effect: Used by a trainer in battle : Attempts to catch a wild Pokémon. The wild Pokémon’s catch rate is 1.5× normal.
short_effect: Tries to catch a Pokémon in the Bug-Catching contest in National Park. (Gen II: Park Ball)

flavor_text.sword_shield: A special Poké Ball that was used during the Bug-Catching Contest in the Johto region.
